Sermons on Church Template http://localhost:60823/sermons/ Recent content in Sermons on Church Template Hugo en-us Sun, 24 Mar 2024 00:00:00 +0000 Jesus Heals the Broken http://localhost:60823/sermons/2024-03-24-jesus-heals/ Sun, 24 Mar 2024 00:00:00 +0000 http://localhost:60823/sermons/2024-03-24-jesus-heals/

In Mark 2, we see Jesus healing the paralyzed man lowered through the roof. This miracle not only shows His power over the body but His authority to forgive sin.
